attributes.additional_details:
You can find evidence of our own prime minister lying on YouTube or Facebook videos. 
We need change and fast before there is nothing left off this country. 
We need to tax the cooperations what they owe (34bn) axe trident (165bn) so we don't have to take from the poorer people anymore! It's time to take a stand!
attributes.background:
My snap election petition has started because the Tories are all for the rich and none for the poor. 
The tax credits cuts are just one example of their blatant lies. 
They fear monger saying they need to make these cuts or the nhs and police service will suffer. We need change now!
